name: acs-dynamic-queue-calling
description: Dynamic queue system with Azure Communication Services

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:agent" "npm run dev:supervisor"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:agent && npm run build:supervisor
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../agent-webapp && npm install && cd ../supervisor-webapp && npm install
